subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Amid all the questions of what might have been after a season-ending loss to Kansas, Southern Illinois Coach Chris Lowery had plenty of reasons to feel puffed up about how far his Salukis had come this season.
snippet: Amid all the questions of what might have been after a season-ending loss to Kansas, Southern Illinois Coach Chris Lowery had plenty of reasons to feel puffed up about how far his Salukis had come this season.
